body:
The slow walk of candidates declaring they are running for president took another step forward on Monday with Senator Marco Rubio saying he plans to make a “big announcement” in a couple of weeks. 

Mr. Rubio, a Florida Republican, confirmed reports that supporters should plan on being in Miami on April 13.

The senator offered few details about the event on this website, noting that his team was still finalizing the location and timing.

“Don’t worry, we’ll let everyone know as soon as the details are confirmed,” said a statement on Mr. Rubio’s website, which said tickets were expected to be limited because of strong demand. 

So far, Senator Ted Cruz of Texas is the only Republican to formally announce his candidacy. Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky is expected to do so on April 7.
description: The slow walk of candidates declaring they are running for president took another step forward on Monday with Senator Marco Rubio announcing plans to make a “big announcement” in a couple of weeks.
title: First Draft: Rubio Confirms Date of ‘Big Announcement’
